user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the use case

epics.title: Project Setup and Infrastructure
epics.summary: Set up the base environment and project architecture
epics.description: Initiate the project by establishing the necessary technical foundation including repositories, environments, frameworks, and continuous integration tools. Define architecture patterns, version control policies, and dependencies to ensure scalability, maintainability, and team-wide consistency from the start.

epics.title: User Authentication and Access Control
epics.summary: Implement user authentication and access management
epics.description: Implement a secure and flexible authentication system allowing users to register, log in, and recover passwords. Introduce role-based permissions to define access levels for different user types. Focus on data security, session management, and compliance with modern authentication standards.

epics.title: Core Functional Modules
epics.summary: Develop the main business logic and core features
epics.description: Build the fundamental components of the product that deliver core business value. Define entities, establish workflows, and integrate business rules that align with project objectives. Design APIs and database interactions to support seamless data operations and application scalability.

epics.title: User Interface and Experience
epics.summary: Design and build responsive and user-friendly interfaces
epics.description: Create intuitive, accessible, and visually appealing interfaces that provide users with an engaging experience. Ensure responsiveness across all devices and browsers. Utilize consistent styling, standardized UI components, and feedback-driven enhancements to improve overall usability.

epics.title: Integrations and Advanced Features
epics.summary: Add third-party integrations and advanced functionality
epics.description: Extend platform capabilities through integration with external APIs, services, or tools such as analytics, notifications, or payment systems. Build advanced features like reports, dashboards, or automation utilities. Ensure each integration adheres to security standards and optimizes overall performance.

epics.title: Testing, Deployment, and Monitoring
epics.summary: Ensure quality assurance, deploy to production, and monitor performance
epics.description: Conduct comprehensive testing including unit, integration, and regression testing to identify and resolve issues before release. Set up automated deployment pipelines and establish monitoring solutions for performance tracking and troubleshooting. Maintain post-deployment feedback loops for continuous improvement.

user_stories.title: Set up initial project repository and environment
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to set up the initial project repository and environment, so that we have a foundation to start development.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Repository should follow best practices for structure and naming. Environment should include basic setup for development.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Repository created with initial commit. Development environment set up and documented.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new project, when I initialize the repository, then it should have the base structure and initial commit.

user_stories.title: Define architecture patterns and version control policies
user_stories.description: As a system architect, I want to define architecture patterns and version control policies, so that the project maintains consistency and scalability.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Policies should be documented and accessible to team members. Patterns should be suitable for project requirements.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Documentation on architecture patterns and version control policies available to all team members.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the project requirements, when I define the architecture patterns, then they should align with the project's needs.

user_stories.title: Implement user registration functionality
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to register on the platform, so that I can access its features.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Registration form should validate user input. Users should receive a confirmation email.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can register with valid details and receive a confirmation email.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new user, when they fill out the registration form with valid details, then they should receive a confirmation email.

user_stories.title: Implement user login functionality
user_stories.description: As a registered user, I want to log in, so that I can access my account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Login should be secure. Users should be able to recover their passwords.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Registered users can log in with valid credentials. Password recovery option available.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a registered user, when they log in with valid credentials, then they should be granted access to their account.

user_stories.title: Define core entities and business logic
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to define core entities and business logic, so that the system can process and manage core functionalities.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Entities should align with business requirements. Business logic should be robust and well-documented.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Core entities and business logic defined and documented.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the business requirements, when defining core entities, then they should align with the specified needs.

user_stories.title: Design responsive user interface
user_stories.description: As a front-end developer, I want to design a responsive user interface, so that users have a consistent experience across devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: UI should be aesthetically pleasing and functional. Responsiveness must be tested on various devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User interface responds well on desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different devices, when accessing the user interface, then the experience should be consistent and responsive.

user_stories.title: Integrate third-party payment gateway
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to make secure payments, so that I can purchase products/services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integration must be secure and comply with payment regulations.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can make secure payments via the integrated payment gateway.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a purchase, when the user proceeds to payment, then the payment should be processed securely.

user_stories.title: Set up automated deployment pipeline
user_stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to set up an automated deployment pipeline, so that we can ensure efficient and error-free deployments.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Pipeline should include stages for building, testing, and deploying the code.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Automated deployment pipeline set up and tested.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a code change, when the pipeline is triggered, then the build, test, and deployment stages should complete successfully.
